name: Wellness Expo 2023
shortDescription: Join us for a day of health and wellness. Get free health screenings, attend informative workshops, and explore a wide range of wellness products.

name: FitFest 2023
shortDescription: Get active and stay fit at FitFest! Participate in fitness challenges, yoga sessions, and sample healthy snacks from TrustCare health vendors. Be fit be happy

name: Mental Health Awareness Day
shortDescription: Join us for a day of discussions and activities to raise awareness about mental health. Break the stigma and prioritize your well-being in TrustCare health.

name: Family Health Fair
shortDescription: A fun-filled day for the whole family! Enjoy health screenings, games, and interactive workshops on family nutrition and well-being in TrustCare Healh.

name: Senior Wellness Day
shortDescription: Seniors, join us for a day dedicated to your well-being. Explore senior-friendly fitness options, receive health checkups, and enjoy social activities.

name: Healthy Eating Expo
shortDescription: Discover the benefits of a balanced diet at our Healthy Eating Expo. Sample delicious and nutritious foods, attend cooking demos, and consult with dietitians.
